facts: The scene takes place at a large terrace in Washington D.C., at a major fund raising party
A terrace overlooking the Washington Mall and the Capitol Building.
ADRIAN HELMSLEY, 32, stands with a group of young POLITICAL AIDES.
Adrian Helmsley is the only African-American among the group of POLITICAL AIDES.
One of the POLITICAL AIDES spots CARL ANHEUSER, 58, who is the White House Chief of Staff
Carl Anheusser is working the crowd.
comm_style: Political Aid #1 admires the White House senior staff and want to be like them
Political Aid #2 admires the White House senior staff and want to be like them
Adrian is a geologist and the Chief Science Adviser to the President of USA
Adrian is well spoken and polite
Adrian is always interested in what other people has to say
Anheuser is a politician, well spoken, but arrogant and very secretive
Anheuser is only interested in expressing his opinion, and not hearing other people's opinions
Anheuser conceals the truth about the end of the world, in order to save only the highest and most influential part of the human race
Anheuser discriminates anyone he doesn't consider to be at his level of society
Prof West is a geological scientist working for the US government
Prof West is a friend of Adrian
Prof West is very anxious about the coming end of the world, wants to desperately do something about it
goals: Adrian shares his negative opinion baout Anheuser with Political Aids
Anheuser overhears Adrian's negative comment about him
Adrian answers a call from Prof West
